name: Monoceros • Ecommerce One Page Template
description:
Hello friends,


We are pleased to share with you a variation of our first free resource, Monoceros. It’s a One Page template to showcase your products.


We tried to redesign a more B2C and minimalist version of our first e-commerce template. This first version featured our mascot, namely Cornelia.


We hope this resource will inspire you.

Enjoy !


Download
